ai-tika-vin07t36:2_1: This is the fifth chapter on nuns.
ai-tika-vin07t36:2_2: The one whose cankers have destroyed the aggregates, (which is) the sections of the Abstractions, etc., of the clay.
ai-tika-vin07t36:2_3: “But in the end of a thousand years he stood looking for one thousand years and sixty thousand years.”
ai-tika-vin07t36:2_4: Discussion of the doctrines that came from the Aṅguttara Commentary One, having spoken thus: “This is how it should be unsurpassed, studied with the differentiation of the Factors, for the sake of a teacher, or for the sake of a teacher, and held on the instruction.”
ai-tika-vin07t36:2_5: For the ultimate man who is profitable, in accordance with the highest dead, the laity, and the Discussion is the variety of paths.
ai-tika-vin07t36:3_0: The account of Mahāpajāpatī Gotamī is finished.
ai-tika-vin07t36:4_0: The account of the full ordination of the nuns’ full ordination
ai-tika-vin07t36:5_0: When it was time for the day of the gathering, they spent the day in that very day, and then they left.
ai-tika-vin07t36:6_0: one who enters upon the way of speaking illustrious offenses, and one who has committed an offense entailing acquisition of deeds.
ai-tika-vin07t36:7_1: Pāṭaliputta, two nuns, three nuns to shave two nuns.
ai-tika-vin07t36:7_2: Nor telling the Monastic Code, nor telling him,
ai-tika-vin07t36:8_0: Having made an agreement for the countless hundreds of assemblies of the Jewels, and announced it to the merchant,
ai-tika-vin07t36:9_0: they wrap the colour of gold coins and silver, and so on,
ai-tika-vin07t36:9_1: if she urges her on to scattered;
ai-tika-vin07t36:10_0: having consecrated the captives in the end of the life,
ai-tika-vin07t36:10_1: (The three beginnings): the root of the trees, the root of a tree, or the abode of the mountain.
ai-tika-vin07t36:11_0: likewise those nuns who look for something, which is senior and distributed, and distributed by the senior nuns, who do not accept at the end of the corruptions. The meaning is that they did not accept.
ai-tika-vin07t36:11_1: (So) people continually present to him, they say: “There is authority that is authority,
ai-tika-vin07t36:12_0: A monk rapeds a trainee nun, a trainee nun, a trainee nun, messenger to a trainee nun.
ai-tika-vin07t36:13_1: After doing a building work, he should not give permission and doing the news in the Sangha’s new deeds, and the restroom, and then departing from the ground.
ai-tika-vin07t36:14_0: They’d assemble and store it up.
ai-tika-vin07t36:15_0: The account of the full ordination of the nuns’ full ordination is finished.
ai-tika-vin07t36:16_0: The chapter on nuns is finished.
